ComicInfo.Summary:
In this issue: Judge Dredd: The Lion's Den by Michael Carroll, PJ Holden, Adam Brown, and Annie Parkhouse; Brink by Dan Abnett, INJ Culbard, and Simon Bowland; Sláine: Psychopomp by Pat Mills, Simon Davis, and Ellie De Ville; Black Shuck: Sins of the Father by Leah Moore, John Reppion, Steve Yeowell, Chris Blythe, and Ellie De Ville; Grey Area: Last Call by Dan Abnett, Mark Harrison, and Annie Parkhouse.
Cover: Simon Davis
